body_html:
Do you have any idea to solve Pickling Error in Python2.7 below? I don't use Python 2.7 so I'm not sure the reason.

PicklingError: Can't pickle <type 'instancemethod'>: attribute lookup __builtin__.instancemethod failed

body:
Do you have any idea to solve Pickling Error in Python2.7 below? I don't use Python 2.7 so I'm not sure the reason.

```
PicklingError: Can't pickle <type 'instancemethod'>: attribute lookup __builtin__.instancemethod failed
```
